gov.va.isaac

Class AppContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.isaac.AppContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedAppContext

    public class AppContext
extends Object
    AppContext Provides convenience methods for retrieving implementations of various interfaces from the HK2 dependency management system.
    Author:
    Dan Armbrust

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup()
                  throws ClassNotFoundException,
                         IOException
        Call this once (and only once) to initialize the ISAAC HK2 service Locator. After this is called, you can access the service locator via convenience methods here, or via a call directly to HK2: ServiceLocatorFactory.getInstance().create("ISAAC");
        Throws:
        IOException
        ClassNotFoundException
